title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil pasta, cook beef, mix with sauce.
description: A hearty Italian pasta dish with a rich, meaty tomato sauce.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients and cook on a griddle.
description: Fluffy and golden, these are perfect for breakfast or dessert.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Cook chicken, mix with lettuce, dressing, croutons, and cheese.
description: A classic salad with juicy chicken and tangy Caesar dressing.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Chop vegetables, stir-fry with sauce and seasonings.
description: A vibrant and healthy dish with fresh veggies and bold flavors.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread, place cheese between slices, grill until golden brown.
description: A gooey and crispy classic perfect for a quick snack.

title: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs, add ingredients, cook in a pan.
description: A fluffy and customizable breakfast favorite.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef, assemble with toppings in taco shells.
description: A flavorful Mexican favorite packed with toppings.

title: Margarita Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on dough, add cheese and basil, bake until crispy.
description: A simple yet delicious pizza with fresh basil and mozzarella.

title: Fruit Smoothie
description: A refreshing and healthy drink made with fresh fruits.

title: Roasted Veggie Bowl
instructions: Roast vegetables and chickpeas, serve in a bowl.
description: A wholesome and satisfying bowl with roasted veggies and spices.
